Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus stumbles back as the blast had taken his right hand off. He holds the end of his right arm where the hand used to be as sparks fly from the wound.

Rodimus: Gahh! No honor among you... Then I'll do this your way!

Rodimsu replaces the hand with the extending buzzsaw he has on that limb. He jumps at Cyclonus as if he was to slash him with the saw but it is a ruse. While close to his enemy, Rodimus activates one of his rockets which swings up over his right shoulder and launches at Cyclonus. Rodimus was willing to take himself out to stop Cyclonus...

OOC: Got a problem RPers. As of this Friday my room mate who owns the laptop I'm using as well as the cable/internet account is moving. I have a new room mate moving in on Saturday who has a computer and we will be getting internet back but it might be a few days. So I might be MIA for a short while. Hopefully its all cleared up quickly.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus: Let's just say that I've learned to do whatever is needed
 > when you fight with everything on the line.
 > 
 > Rodimus had just finished his line when he was struck by the kick.
 > The talking had distracted him for a brief second. Rodimus sails
 > backwards a bit, spinning, striking the ground face down.
 > 
 > Rodimus gets up and moves in on Cyclonus with his arms out stretched,
 > ready for a grapple. Rodimus attemps to tie it up with Cyclonus with
 > his right hand going for Cyclonus' left arm and his left for
 > Cyclonus' right collar area.
 
 Cyclonus frowns as his optics dim in derision. "You seek hand to hand?
 How quaint, but utterly foolish." Cyclonus actually allows Rodimus to
 grab him and pull him closer. It is not until the move is complete that
 Cyclonus ruse is revealed. Pulling him in close leaves Rodimus open to
 the full brunt of Cyclonus' oxidation cannon, which is now at nearly
 point blank range. With a burst of power Cyclonus fires at Rodimus!
 "Hand to hand indeed!"
 
 Preston
 (Cyclonus)
